overview: A series of murders leads Commander Trujillo to Santa Rosa de la Sal a town close to a salt mine, where he meets Victor Zepeda - a lonely teenager who works in his father's funeral home and spends his free time making crude animated horror films - who's strange behavior seems to point at him as the culprit of the crimes.

production_companies.name: Fondo de Inversión y Estímulos al Cine (FIDECINE)

tagline: Some things should be kept beneath.
title: Under the Salt
